response.overview: Ten stories from horror's top directors. Ghosts, ghouls, monsters, and the devil delight in terrorizing unsuspecting residents of a suburban neighborhood on Halloween night. This creepy anthology combines classic Halloween tales with the stuff of nightmares.
response.tagline: One town. One night. Ten chilling stories.
response.title: Tales of Halloween

cast.name: Christophe Zajac-Denek
cast.character: Mordecai / The Little Devil (segment "The Night Billy Raised Hell")

cast.character: The Dentist (segment "The Night Billy Raised Hell")

cast.name: Melissa 'Mo' Meinhart
cast.character: Witch / Bobbie's Hand / Arm Double (segment "Ding Dong") (as Mo Meinhardt)

cast.name: Katie Silverman
cast.character: Young Alice (segment "The Weak and the Wicked")

cast.name: Matt Merchant
cast.character: The Demon (segment "The Weak and the Wicked")

cast.name: Jennifer Wenger

cast.name: A.J. Meyers
